website_summaries.verdict: Solid wood and more sturdy than other racks.We like the look, stability, and beauty of this option.
pros: We found this rack to have a rich finish with 4 stabilizing feet
The quality of this product is high and the top is designed to spin for easy access to your hanging items
cons: More expensive than other racks, but not extraordinarily high for a piece of household furniture

customer_reviews.title: Very classy and practical coat rack
customer_reviews.text: I never had a coat rack before, and I wanted something better than just some hooks on the wall. I wanted a really nice coat rack that could hold a lot of jackets and not hog a lot of wall space. And this was it! I had looked at other coat racks, but they generally tend to be ugly and/or have only a couple of usable hooks. This one will hold 8 coats, 3 umbrellas, and a hat (or some other combination of items, depending on where you put them). The only minus is that it does list to one side, as others have mentioned. It can probably be leveled, but apparently it's not perfect right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Staton

customer_reviews.title: YES!  It has 3 legs!! Not 4!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why anyone would complain that is "doesn't have 4 legs like the picture"??? 3 legs are a solid a stable platform. 4, and it will wobble, unless you have a perfectly level floor (who does?) This is an extremely nice coat pole. Love that the top pivots! Even has pocketbook holders! (Yeah! No more yelling at the wife for hanging her purse on the closet door handle! :)
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Keeps clothing worn often tidy and at hand.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 12 year old granddaughter to help keep her room tidy. She loves and actually used it. Bought it in white. Goes perfectly in her room. Shipping box needs to be reinforced. Box was in terrible shape upon arrival, several holes and parts poking out. Fortunately there was no damage. Very easy to assemble! May purchase one in darker wood for my foyer for jackets.
customer_reviews.author: O'Henry

customer_reviews.title: Quality coat rack for the money
customer_reviews.text: This coat rack is made with real good quality . It has four legs which make it stable even with heavy coats on it. It is very nice looking with a beautiful cherry finish on it - goes with almost any decour . It has more than enough hooks on it to hold a lot of coats etc. I wanted a good coat rack that looked good and was not real expensive. This coat rack fit the bill .
customer_reviews.author: Earl Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality coat rack.  Best wood one for the money on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Stable, long and wide legs that keep coat rack from tipping. Finish is also very high quality. Wood seems strong with no cracks. Before purchasing this I ordered another similar yet less expensive one on Amazon. That less expensive one was a piece of junk. It had large cracks in the hooks that screwed into the coat rack top making them loose and one even fell apart and off the rack, also the finish was very cheap, dull and ugly. This coat rack however is everything that less expensive one was not. Trust me and pay the extra $30-ish and get this one and you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Elian

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Put together with my small children in about 5 minutes. I refuse to buy cheap fake wood products So this being solid wood is worth the price. Have 3 backpacks and six coats on it at a time and it is super sturdy as long as too much weight isn’t on one side. The bottom 3 pegs are perfect for my daughters things since she is smaller.
customer_reviews.author: MaKayla Jo

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and couldn't be happier with the product. Solid wood, came packaged well and puts together easily. What I really like the most is it's heft. When I hang my jackets and purse on it, it does not move or feel like it is going to tip over. Made like wood products used to be made!
customer_reviews.author: too busy to shop in stores

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful coat rack. I rarely leave reviews but this was so easy to put together and looks great. It looks way more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: Joel and Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Only Last Two Months
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product!!! Firstly, the price is not cheap I thought should be a reliable piece. But I only got this item two month and it just fell apart, which hit my husband and scratched the wall. Secondly, I tried to contact the customer service, but no response at all. For your safety, stay away from this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Tang

customer_reviews.title: The coat rack is good for what I need it for
customer_reviews.text: The coat rack is good for what I need it for. There are 4 legs as pictured. However, the holes where the hooks go in are clearly punched out by a machine and not aligned correctly. As I was assembling the second large hook it cracked around the hole as I was twisting it in. Not the best quality I can see for the price. Looks good though!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for nine months, use it daily and just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pontius

customer_reviews.title: coat rack
customer_reviews.text: Everybody remarks on the coat rack it looks great. received in great condition and I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Westfall

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This coat rack is a beautiful piece of furniture. I use it in the bedroom to hang my clothes on. I would purchase this product again if the need presents itself. It is easy to assemble, very sturdy, and worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: This item is attractive and matches well, but it leans to one side and there is no way of straightening it out. It holds jackets with no issue and then you can’t tell it’s lopsided
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L. Overton

customer_reviews.title: You can hang your coat and hat on this rack!
customer_reviews.text: A solid piece of furniture that I found very simple to assemble. We currently have three coats on the rack and its very sturdy. Beautiful wood finished.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as pictured but holding up well
customer_reviews.text: So far this coat rack is holding up (literally) much better than the last one we ordered. It has 3 feet on the bottom instead of the 4 that the picture appears to show, and I was very concerned about that at first, but so far it's holding up well under many coats and hats. It wasn't super easy to assemble, but I like that everything is held in my screws and not just pieces of wood that fit together.
customer_reviews.author: Fiji Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful and the top part goes 360`
customer_reviews.text: We bought two. They are beautiful and the top part goes 360`. However, one of them came with way too many termites holes. There were no more termites living there but I could tell that there were at some point of the wood's life.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Pflucker

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed and made product
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly designed product and workmanship was terrible. Most parts didn't fit as they should. Couldn't even stand on its own without bending. The top part couldn't even be screwed on.
customer_reviews.author: SydHJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute coat rack. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Cute coat rack. I assembled by myself in under 30 minutes. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Terryl Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to this coat rack, it arrived in its original box damaged. The box itself is thin and has damages to it i took pictures before i opened it because it looks so beat up i had a bad feeling it may be damaged inside. So lo and behold one of the hooks is cracked. Update: the manufacturer was able to replace the broken piece. Now works great and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable (I suppose...)
customer_reviews.text: The pic of this product absolutely shows that it has FOUR legs. When I opened it, it absolutely has THREE legs. Also the legs don't fit on as well as they should so the whole rack is slightly canted to one side. But it does hold my coats and hats, so I suppose it will do...
customer_reviews.author: Lee Norris

customer_reviews.title: One Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: One leg was broken, one bottom post was defect. Later was replaced after I called to Monarch, then I found the received one(bottom post) was scratched many area, color not matching, and dent or chip off around the post. I feel like they sent me a trash for replacing.
customer_reviews.author: freshwater

customer_reviews.title: 1 year old, still in top shape!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Love how top will rotate. Great longevity and sturdiness. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy coat hanger!
customer_reviews.text: I love our new coat hanger! Great quality and it’s very sturdy. At the moment I have 9 coats on it and it’s going strong. Easy to assemble because I did it in less than I would say 20mins. I just wanted to make sure I was doing each step right. I live in a one bedroom apartment and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Far better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid coat rack. It doesn’t feel flimsy at all. Very easy to put together. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DC3377

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assemble .. sturdier construction than others I have purchased. Highly recommend !! (Helen More)
customer_reviews.author: Helen M. More

customer_reviews.title: Mine came with 4 legs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I worried about the 3 leg vs 4 leg question. Mine came with 4 legs and is exactly what I wanted and needed. Good Quality, not great, but good, Price is reasonable for quality.
customer_reviews.author: captainmidnigt

customer_reviews.title: Quality and service .
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product without any problems . Just changed my mind .
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Salinski

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and holds coats
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy and holds coats. The finish is my quip with this product. The light cherry finish looks cheap in comparison to the woodwork it was picked to match. It doesn't matter much because it's mostly coats!
customer_reviews.author: Idontknownotin

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish, very sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We're very pleased with this coat rack. It has a beautiful cherry finish, is very sturdy and was easy to assemble. We're using it in a tight corner, so the fact that the top tier spins to easily access all the arms is a great feature. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful coat rack. Very sturdy & heavy. A stable piece of furniture. Looks great in my entry way.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Page

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice,  easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy...easy to put together. Looks nice in my hallway. Despite sone of the reviews complaining about putting this together. It was VERY easy.
customer_reviews.author: KerryW

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Four Legged Stand
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous ordering this based on some other reviews but took a chance and so satisfied with product!!! Beautiful and well made and the top turns...so useful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice, Im very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice, Im very happy with this purchase! I have like 5 coats, 2 hats, several scarves, and my umbrella hanging on it. I thought it was suppose to have 4 legs of support at the base, and it only has 3, but, seems pretty sturdy. The color looks amazing. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Super quality. Holds a lot of coats without even slightly rocking or tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Grumblebees

customer_reviews.title: Hang up your coat!  LOL!
customer_reviews.text: Great coat hanger - easy to assemble, study, the top turn so you can get your coat easily, and it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Coat Rack
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the cherry coat rack. It is made well and it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's very well built and looks great in my hallway
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put this coat rack together in 10 minutes. It's very well built and looks great in my hallway. I'm not easy to please, so look no further. This is the coat rack to buy.
customer_reviews.author: VITATAZ

customer_reviews.title: It is not too stable as a one that I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not too stable as a one that I bought from Monarch Specialties. It is missing paint from some parts.
customer_reviews.author: Ama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful I love it,high quality and stable it's simple beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Nely Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a little darker then I would of liked!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and is a great quality coat rack!
customer_reviews.author: Armida

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I recommend this product. Good termination. Very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Ama

customer_reviews.title: NICE RACK !
customer_reviews.text: Mine had FOUR legs. Looks great. Easy to assemble. Feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Coat rack assembled very easy. After about 2 weeks it started leaning. Instead of using reverse thread fasteners, when you screw the rack to the base it unscrews out of the wood of the rack spindle. It was completely stripped out of the wood in two weeks. I have repaired it using epoxy to hold the fastener in the wood. It has held up for a little over a month but I don't know how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what it is a coat rack . It was what I expected. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: wendy Midbust

customer_reviews.title: Overall with the 3 legs and a little marked up I used a little blue medium grade loctite were you screwed it together and a blac
customer_reviews.text: Ok I purchased this 3 legged coat rack yes 3 legged.Picture does show 4 but it only has 3. It did come a little marked up so with that I gave this a 4 star rating.Overall with the 3 legs and a little marked up I used a little blue medium grade loctite were you screwed it together and a black permanent marker to cover up the marked areas it turn out really good and its pretty sturdy not bad . Use a T handle allen wrench to get a good secured tightening on the legs with the loctite and you'll never worry about them coming loose.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: perfect coat tree i use it all the time and my coats fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: it was everything I expected thank you and I use it all the time, I am glad I have it
customer_reviews.author: connie smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coat rack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coat rack. Love it. Solid wood and bueatiful carvings/design.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Bheemappa

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought it would be. Thick and sturdy. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice coat rack
customer_reviews.text: It assembled in less than ten minutes. Mine has 3 legs, but seems very sturdy, It has a good color. all pegs are stained to match. My only complaint is the top tier. It doesn't attach at all, it just sits with a peg in the hole. I would prefer a non swivel. Don't hesitate to purchase. This is a nice piece with good weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sharla

product_meta.title: Monarch Specialties Traditional Solid Wood Coat Rack, Cherry
product_meta.description: Color:CherryComplete the functionality of your home with this classic turned post coat rack. A beautiful turned post anchored with a sturdy pedestal base brings plenty of stylish storage into your living space and makes it simple to organize your entryway, hallway or living room. A traditional solid wood cherry finish completes the classic appeal of this timeless tripled tiered coat rack.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars111 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
